name: hm05
effect: Teaches Defog to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon. (HS: Whirlpool DPP: Defog Gen III & II & I: Flash)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.
